name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in building high-performance microservices using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **REST** principles. Proficient in creating scalable asynchronous APIs and leveraging databases like **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**. Experienced in containerization and orchestration with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless CI/CD workflows with **GitHub Actions**. Demonstrated ability in observability and logging best practices to enhance system reliability.

Proficient in agile communication and collaboration, driving successful project outcomes within cross-functional teams. My technical skills extend to **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Flask**, with a solid foundation in developing machine learning pipelines. Eager to leverage my background in cloud services and CI/CD processes while integrating innovative solutions in tech stacks like **RabbitMQ**, **Terraform**, and **KNative**.
